titleStmt.title: Changes: or, Love in a maze A comedie, as it was presented at the Private House in Salisbury Court, by the Company of His Majesties Revels. Written by Iames Shirley, Gent.
titleStmt.author: Shirley, James, 1596-1666.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G[eorge] P[urslowe] for William Cooke, and are to be sold at his shop neere Furnivals Inne gate in Holborne,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop neere Furnivals Inne gate in Holborne
